amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent the use of funds for Davis-Bacon wages.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 110-509 to prevent appropriations for Davis-Bacon wages.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 268 (Roll no. 15).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. King (IA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 268 (Roll no. 15).
